title: Given Lower Priority Queue for a friend disconnecting in my party?
body: So I was placed in a lower priority queue after my team did a /remake because a guy in my party couldn't connect to the match. Why did this happen?

replies.body:
Because you requeued with him and therefore had to wait because he was in your party?

It shouldn't happen if you go solo.
It was given to me not my friend

If you are inactive in-game while you are awaiting a /remake, you'll likely be marked by the system as AFK. It's a good idea to continue to play the game normally,  so in the event that the missing player reconnects, you and your team won't be far behind. As *That Evelynn* mentioned, if you were in premade with the player who didn't connect and you were in a ranked game at Diamond V or higher, you'd also receive their penalty. For complete details, check out our [/Remake FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ah, I was standing still during the match. Thank you
